Summary: Visible for 4 to 5 minutes white light with amber tint and a single red fhrobing moving north stoping 2 times then lights went out.
divs: sighting detailsmy sighting. 12\21\2011 afton \ oklahoma 7:45pm weather. the temp was 33 deg. visibility clear. ceiling unlimited. i hoped in to my atv and went 1 mile south of town into a hay field on top of a hill. good visibility here. no city light to the east south and west.i turned off all lights and lay on the ground looking up letting my eyes get use to the dark.7:50 to 8:10 looking up seeing normal air traffic . at 8:20 i herd some noise to the south.i got up and went to the front of my atv and herd some howling . it was coyotes . 8:25 still standing looking south i turned and looked south west. i see a white light low moving from the south to the north. did not think anything of it till about 1 minute in. under the white light was a red light. it seem to pulse red once a second . still moving north it stopped then went back south vary vary quick then stopped for 2 seconds then started moving north again. i thought i was seeing things. still moving north the white light had an amber tint to it. still moving north its gone from south west to do west. getting closer it seemed. there was no sound from it. the only sounds i could here were the truck and car traffic on the highway 5 miles away. looking west watching this object still moving north it stops again shoots south again then stops then starts moving north again. i got the willies then started talking to myself . what is this.do i see this. still the object is moving north . still seeing the white light with amber tint and red pulsating light under it. its now wnw of me moving north then it blinked off. when it went off i reached down for my binoculars and looked for the object up down left right it was gone. i did not want to grab the binoculars and take my eyes off it . i have spent thousands of hours out side fishing\camping ext. and thousands looking up. i know what normal aircraft look and sound like. the 4 to 5 minutes i was watching this object it traveled about 8 miles. i know the object i saw was not something i can identify . when this object stopped and went south twice it traveled about 2 miles in a tenth of a second . humans have not built anything like that yet .
